publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-416# Michael Matheson: Football Supporters-Shareholders Trust—That the Parliament acknowledges that football fans have an important role to play in the running of their respective clubs, and considers that a supporters-shareholders trust should be established in order to assist in securing a supporters’ representative on football club boards. Supported by: Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Linda Fabiani*

S1M-416# Michael Matheson: Football Supporters-Shareholders Trust—That the Parliament acknowledges that football fans have an important role to play in the running of their respective clubs, and considers that a supporters-shareholders trust should be established in order to assist in securing a supporters’ representative on football club boards. Supported by: Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Adam Ingram, Linda Fabiani
